Cerebral cortex of ABA 2009.ParcellationScheme: ABA 2009 adult mouse brain parcellation scheme
Cerebral cortex of ABA 2009.Definition: Super-parcellation of Allen Brain Atlas reference atlas comprising cortical plate (isocortex, olfactory areas and hippocampal formation) and and cortical subplate structures (claustrum, endopiriform cortex and some amygdaloid nuclei)
